content: add a focal piece to your room with this stunning checkered crochet throw created using red heart all in one granny square this easy pattern features double_crochet chain and assembly techniques simply make your squares then assemble them to complete the yarn changes color for you use any combination of colors with black for a custom look that agrees with your decor materials red heart® all in one™ granny square™ 8 8 oz/250 g 417 yds/381 m contrast a green scream 2003 3 balls 41 granny squares red heart® super saver® 198 g/7 oz 364 yds/333 m contrast b black 0312 4 balls or 1240 yds/1134 m measurement approx 55 140 cm square
